The Game.

It's a game. Really.

But if you think about it, then, you lose.

What if, in fact, you've already lost ?

WARNING : This game was made for the GDA 1H Jam, so it's REALLY short.

It really sucks too, but... Well... We can't do masterpiece everytime ^^"

This game was made in 1:02, not including debug.

If it bugs, please tell me, I'll check !
